mapper.select: SELECT army_number, password, email, phone_number, army_type, role, name, dept, enlistment_date AS enlistmentDate, discharge_date AS dischargeDate FROM military_user WHERE army_number = #{armyNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO military_user (army_number, password, email, name, role, dept, phone_number, army_type, enlistment_date, discharge_date ) VALUES (#{armyNumber}, #{password}, #{email}, #{name}, #{role}, #{dept}, #{phoneNumber}, #{armyType}, #{enlistmentDate}, #{dischargeDate})
